**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 44 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 [Ancient Skaveling](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2151) **Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 63 **Perception** +29; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), echolocation 60 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +27, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +25 **Str** +8 **Dex** +6 **Con** +4 **Int** +3 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +4 **Echolocation** The ancient skaveling can use its hearing as a [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) sense at the listed range. --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +27 **Will** +29 **HP** 270 --- **Speed** 15 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** fangs +29 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d12+16 piercing plus ghoul fever and paralysis **Melee** wing +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d8+16 bludgeoning plus paralysis **Bone-Shattering Screech** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The ancient skaveling unleashes a devastating screech that not only chills the bones but shatters them. The screech can be heard throughout the region and alerts all creatures in the Hanging Castle. Creatures in a 20-foot emanation take 12d6 sonic damage and must attempt a DC 36 Will save. The ancient skaveling can't use Bone-Shattering Screech again for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Bone-Shattering Screech for 24 hours.
**Success** The creature takes half damage and is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and is frightened 2
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage, is frightened 3, and is [stunned 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). **Ghoul Fever** ([disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 36 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52) the next midnight **Paralysis** ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Any creature hit by the skaveling's Strikes must attempt a DC 36 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35).
**Failure** The creature is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each save.
name: Ancient Skaveling
